title: Notes
description: A live loop that plays a fixed note and then a ring of notes.

code.live_loop:
live_loop :ringNote do
  play 60
  sleep 0.5
  play (ring 10, 20, 30, 40, 50)
  sleep 1
end

title: Synth
description: A simple arpeggio loop using the tb303 synth.

code.main:
live_loop :synth do
  use_synth :tb303 #try changing :tb303 to piano or kalimba
  play :c4
  sleep 0.5
  play :e4
  sleep 0.5
  play :g4
  sleep 0.5
  play :e4
  sleep 0.5
end

title: Scale
description: A looping major pentatonic pattern using the hoover synth.

code.main:
use_synth :hoover
loop do
  #try changing number of octaves, scale,release time
  play_pattern_timed scale(:c3, :major_pentatonic, num_octaves: 3), 0.125, release: 0.1
  sleep 0.25
end

use_synth :pluck
loop do
  #play chord(:E3, :minor) #play a chord
  #sleep 0.5

  play_pattern_timed chord(:E3, :m7), 0.25 # play arpeggio
  sleep 0.25
end

title: Reverse
description: A synced Amen break loop with adjustable playback direction and finish point.

code.main:
live_loop :rev do
  # change rate: 1 to rate: -1
  # change finish: 0.5 to 1
  sample :loop_amen, rate: 1, finish: 0.5, amp: 1
  sleep 2
end

title: Randomize
description: A looping cowbell rhythm with random amplitude and timing.

code.main:
live_loop :random_rhythm do
  # try different values in the amp: rrand() & sleep rrand()
  sample :drum_cowbell, amp: rrand(0.2, 0.6)
  sleep rrand(0.1, 0.5)
end

title: Trim
description: An Amen break loop trimmed by adjusting the start and finish values.

code.main:
live_loop :testtrim do
  # change start and finish values to trim the sample
  sample :loop_amen, start: 0.3, finish: 0.5, amp: 1
  sleep 2
end

title: Echo Effect Bell Loop
description: A looping bell melody processed with an echo effect whose strength can be adjusted.

code.main:
# change the value of mix: 0.2 to anything between 0-1 to change the effect strength
live_loop :echotest do
  with_fx :echo, phase: 0.5, mix: 0.1 do
    use_synth :pretty_bell
    play :c4, release: 1
    sleep 0.5
    play :e4, release: 1
    sleep 0.5
    play :d4, release: 1
    sleep 0.5
  end
end

title: Pan
description: A simple loop demonstrating stereo panning from left to center to right.

code.main:
# pan
live_loop :paning do
  # replace all the pan values with -1, then try 0 and finally try 1.
  play 50, pan: -1
  sleep 0.5
  play 60, pan: 0
  sleep 0.5
  play 70, pan: 1
  sleep 0.5
end

title: Reverb
description: A fast bell scale processed with reverb, demonstrating how room size affects space.

code.main:
# change the value of room to anything between 0-1 to change the apparent room size
live_loop :echotest do
  with_fx :reverb, room: 0.5, mix: 0.5 do
    use_synth :pretty_bell
    play_pattern_timed scale(:c3, :major, num_octaves: 3), 0.125, release: 0.1
    sleep 0.5
  end
end

title: Distortion
description: A looping piano note sequence processed with distortion, demonstrating timbral saturation.

code.main:
# change the value of distort to anything between 0-1 to change the amount of distortion
live_loop :echotest do
  with_fx :distortion, distort: 0.9, mix: 0.9 do
    use_synth :piano
    play (ring 10, 20, 30, 40, 50).choose
    sleep 0.5
  end
end

title: Sample Speed
description: An Amen break loop demonstrating how playback rate affects speed and pitch.

code.main:
live_loop :speed do
  # try changing the rate value to 0.5 to play the sample at half speed
  # next try changing the rate value to 2 to play the sample at double speed
  sample :loop_amen, rate: 2, finish: 0.5, amp: 1
  sleep 1
end
